comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: 1LT Charles H. Dubois, 76th Fighter Squadron, 23rd FG, China. Five confirmed aerial victories. For some unknown reason, he's wearing a U.S. Navy issue G-1 jacket borrowed from 1LT Mortimer D. Marks.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/13935339@N05] This images has Charles Dubois written on the back.
